dict.acceptation: 稳定的；沉稳[持重]的；[物理学]稳定平衡的；持久的；
厩，马厩，马棚，牛棚；畜舍；统称某人拥有（或训练的）赛马；在同一地方工作或训练的)一批人；
使关进畜舍（或马厩、牛棚等），使放入马厩般的室内；
被关在畜舍内，（人）生活在厩一般的地方；

sent.orig: Capture high-level design and architecture as stable abstractions organized into stable package.
sent.trans: 采用高水平的设计和架构使包保持稳定。

sent.orig: Slope lifting design with imported conveyor with stable which stable system can be achieved.
sent.trans: 斜面提升输送，进口输送皮带，动作稳定可靠。

sent.orig: The horse stable is in the main barn; the cow stable is separate.
sent.trans: 马厩在大牲口棚里，牛栏则分开在另外一个地方。

sent.orig: Stable cleaning is achieved by adopting filtrate or overhead water-tank, with stable cleaning pressure.
sent.trans: 采用过滤液或高位水箱达到稳定的清洗，清洗压力稳定。

sent.orig: Stable top quality is depended upon stable quality of raw material.
sent.trans: 毛条质量的稳定性取决于每一次所用原料质量的稳定性。
